sentences.en: A Berber rug makes a colourful wall-hanging.
sentences.cn: 柏柏尔小地毯可以当色彩艳丽的壁毯。

sentences.en: Bryant is alleged to have used colourful language.
sentences.cn: 据称布赖恩特言语粗鲁。

sentences.en: Cockney is the colourful dialect spoken in the East End of London.
sentences.cn: 伦敦方言是在伦敦东区讲的颇有特色的地方语.
五颜六色的加利福尼亚明信片

sentences.en: Her colourful oils and works on paper have a naive, dreamlike quality.
sentences.cn: 她那些色彩斑斓的油画与纸上作品给人一种天真、梦幻般的感觉。

sentences.en: Her mother had mentioned how colourful the yard was, now that spring had arrived.
sentences.cn: 她母亲提到由于春天已经来到,院子里已是五彩缤纷.

sentences.en: Many of the dancers at the fancy dress ball wore colourful masks.
sentences.cn: 化装舞会上的许多跳舞者戴着五颜六色的面具.

sentences.en: Many of them wore colourful national costumes.
sentences.cn: 他们很多人都穿着色彩鲜艳的民族服装.

sentences.en: More details surfaced of her colourful past as the story developed.
sentences.cn: 随着故事的发展，更多有关她不同寻常的过去的细节开始为人所知。

sentences.en: Nature is most colourful in autumn.
sentences.cn: 秋天,大自然的色彩最为丰富.

sentences.en: The colourful balloons rose high into the air.
sentences.cn: 五颜六色的气球腾空而起.

sentences.en: The colourful flags added to the gaiety of the occasion.
sentences.cn: 彩旗增添了盛会的欢乐气氛。

sentences.en: The flowers were colourful and the scenery magnificent.
sentences.cn: 花儿五颜六色，景色蔚为壮观。

sentences.en: The game followed a colourful opening ceremony before a crowd of seventy-four thousand.
sentences.cn: 绚丽多彩的开幕式过后，这场比赛在74,000名观众的瞩目之下开始了。

sentences.en: The male birds are more colourful than the females.
sentences.cn: 这种鸟雄性比雌性更加色彩艳丽。

words.tran_cn: 无色的；苍白的；无趣味的
无色的；不生动的；颜色黯淡的
颜色；风格；气色，面色；外貌
着色；色彩；抛光；倾向性；外貌
把…涂颜色，粉饰；歪曲；使脸红
给…着色（colour的过去式和过去分词）
鲜艳的；生动的；富色彩的；富有趣味的

trans.tran_cn: 颜色鲜艳的，有趣的，粗鲁的
trans.tran_en: having bright colours or a lot of different colours
